name: Just SING! 80s Collection
publishers: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG
synopsis: The ‘80s are back and you’re a star! Grab your Nintendo DSi system and have some ultimate karaoke fun. You can expect all the cult hits of the era: Like a Virgin, Take On Me, Never Gonna Give You Up and The Heat Is On. Style your avatar in a classic ‘80s look, and take to the stage. Can you keep to the beat and hit all the notes? Perform the biggest party hits of the ‘80s and experience a musical blast from the past! - Like A Virgin - Take On Me - Never Gonna Give You Up - The Heat Is On
